00036 template<typename Point, typename T>
00037 Point newRandomPoint(T Min, T Max)
00038 {
00039   double d;
00040   double e;
00041   double f;
00042   Point a;
00043   double max, min;
00044   max = (double) Max;
00045   min = (double) Min;
00046   for(unsigned int i=0;i < Point::__DIM;++i)
00047     {
00048       d = __drand48__();
00049       if(min > 0)
00050         {
00051           e = (d*max)-(d*min);
00052           f = min;
00053         }
00054       else
00055         {
00056           e = (d*max)+min;
00057           f = -(d*min);
00058         }
00059       
00060       a[i] = (T) (e+f);
00061     }
00062   return a;
00063 }

00065 template<typename T, unsigned DIM>
00066 bool testNN(unsigned int Size, unsigned int k, T min, T max)
00067 {
00068   typedef reviver::dpoint<T, DIM> Point;
00069   std::vector<Point> data;
00070   std::vector<Point> query;
00071   std::vector<long unsigned int> sfcnn_ans;
00072   std::vector<long unsigned int> bf_ans;
00073 
00074   data.resize(Size);
00075   query.resize(Size);
00076   
00077   for(unsigned int i=0;i < data.size();++i)
00078     {
00079       data[i]  = newRandomPoint<Point, T>(min, max);
00080       query[i] = newRandomPoint<Point, T>(min, max);
00081     }
00082 
00083   bruteNN<Point> BF(&data[0], data.size());
00084   sfcnn<Point, DIM, T> SFC(&data[0], data.size());
00085 
00086   for(unsigned int i=0;i < data.size();++i)
00087     {
00088       BF.ksearch(query[i], k, bf_ans);
00089       SFC.ksearch(query[i], k, sfcnn_ans); 
00090       
00091       for(unsigned int j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00092         {
00093           if(bf_ans[j] != sfcnn_ans[j])
00094             return false;
00095         }
00096     }
00097   return true;
00098 }

00129 template<typename T, unsigned DIM>
00130 bool testKNNG(unsigned int Size, unsigned int k, T min, T max, int num_threads)
00131 {
00132   typedef reviver::dpoint<T, DIM> Point;
00133   std::vector<Point> data;
00134   std::vector<long unsigned int> bf_ans;
00135 
00136   data.resize(Size);
00137   
00138   for(unsigned int i=0;i < data.size();++i)
00139     {
00140       data[i]  = newRandomPoint<Point, T>(min, max);
00141     }
00142 
00143   bruteNN<Point> BF(&data[0], data.size());
00144   sfcnn_knng<Point, DIM, T> SFC(&data[0], data.size(), k, num_threads);
00145 
00146   for(unsigned int i=0;i < data.size();++i)
00147     {
00148       BF.ksearch(data[i], k+1, bf_ans);
00149       for(unsigned int j=1;j < k+1;++j)
00150         {
00151           if(bf_ans[j] != SFC[i][j-1])
00152             return false;
00153         }
00154     }
00155   return true;
00156 }

00158 template<typename T, unsigned DIM>
00159 bool testZLT(T Min, T Max)
00160 {
00161   typedef reviver::dpoint<T, DIM> Point;
00162 
00163   Point min, max, random;
00164   zorder_lt<Point> lt;
00165 
00166   for(unsigned i = 0; i < DIM;++i)
00167     {
00168       min[i]=Min;
00169       max[i]=Max;
00170     }
00171   random = newRandomPoint<Point, T>(Min, Max);
00172   while((random == min) || (random == max))
00173     {
00174       random = newRandomPoint<Point, T>(Min, Max);
00175     }
00176 
00177   if(lt(max, min)) return false;
00178   if(lt(random, min)) return false;
00179   if(lt(max, random)) return false;
00180   if(!lt(min, max)) return false;
00181   if(!lt(min, random)) return false;
00182   if(!lt(random, max)) return false;
00183   return true;
00184 }

00186 template<typename T, unsigned DIM>
00187 bool testSORT(unsigned int Size, T Min, T Max)
00188 {
00189   typedef reviver::dpoint<T, DIM> Point;
00190   std::vector<Point> points;
00191   zorder_lt<Point> lt;
00192 
00193   for(unsigned int i=0;i < Size;++i)
00194     {
00195       points.push_back(newRandomPoint<Point, T>(Min, Max));
00196     }
00197   sort(points.begin(), points.end(), lt);
00198 
00199   for(unsigned int i=0;i < Size-1;++i)
00200     {
00201       if(!lt(points[i], points[i+1])) return false;
00202     }
00203   return true;
00204 }
